principles: DYOR; always verify narrative, community and on-chain before entry
Patience; avoid FOMO; aim for consistent daily PnL not lottery wins
Risk 1% per trade; stop-loss mandatory; partial take-profits x2/x3
Diversify; isolate high-risk in burner wallet

trader_quotes.advice: Avoid overdiversification; focus on few high-conviction plays
trader_quotes.name: Ackman

trader_quotes.advice: Invest in what you understand; ignore volatility noise
trader_quotes.name: Buffett

trader_quotes.advice: Circle of competence; keep a learning journal
trader_quotes.name: Lynch

trader_quotes.advice: Use data and automation to overcome emotion
trader_quotes.name: Simons
